headline.main: Auchinleck Annotates Nazi Diary To Point Lessons for His Troops; German Soldier's Reflections on Actions in Desert Last June Are Published With British General's Comments

lead_paragraph: CAIRO, Egypt, Sept. 24 -- The following message from General Sir Claude J.E. Auchinleck, British Commander in Chief in the Middle East, for troops in the Middle East was written for publication in the troops official magazine, issued at Cairo:
abstract: Auchinleck annotates German soldier's diary on June Solum-Capuzzo action

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS

snippet: CAIRO, Egypt, Sept. 24 -- The following message from General Sir Claude J.E. Auchinleck, British Commander in Chief in the Middle East, for troops in the Middle East was written for publication in the troops official magazine, issued at Cairo:...
